text:
Hello,
I’m seeking assistance in integrating my API with HubSpot’s “automation tool” and making it available as a public app. Could someone please guide me to the relevant documentation? Despite my search efforts, I couldn’t locate the URL.
Thank you in advance.

Hey guys, does anyone know if the HubSpot API allows us to connect GPT to the HubSpot chatbot or custom-made for the Landing Page or web page?
Does Marketplace allow this App?
<@U01QVR44MEY>, someone can shed some light on this?
